text.emotional: You can use a mulcher on any crop that leaves stubble. Such as wheat, barley, oat, sorghum, sunflowers, soybeans, and corn.
text.silence: {.} you can use a mulcher {.} on {...} any crop that leaves {.} stubble {....} such as wheat {....} barley {...} oat {....} sorghum {....} sunflowers {...} soybeans {...} and corn {...}
